issue: Purchased a pack of cigarettes. Four of the twenty cigarettes fell apart when I tried to slip the tobacco back into the filter. Smoke was coming out of the middle of the cigarette, giving it an unpleasant taste. I am sending the cigarettes back to show you the problem.

personal_info.husband: my husband and I have been chain smokers for over 20 years
personal_info.preference: I would hate to have to switch brands due to faulty cigarettes falling apart on me. I expect twenty cigarettes I can smoke, not to fix them myself, which results in getting chills from the taste.
personal_info.next_choice: I guess Marlboro Lights are the next choice.
